import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import UserContext from '../context/UserContext'; import axios from './Axios'; export default function Menu() { const userCtx = useContext(UserContext); const initialState = { loading: false, data:[], error: null, } const [consultants, setConsultants] = useState(initialState); useEffect(()=>{ axios.get('consultants?sort=code').then((result)=>{ setConsultants({loading: true, data:result.data.data, error: null, }) }).catch((err)=>{ setConsultants({loading: true, data:[], error: "menu хэсгийн алдаа:"+err.message, }) }) },[]); return ( <>
{/* Brand Logo */} Tenger travel {/* Sidebar */}
{/* Sidebar user panel (optional) */}
{userCtx.userState.firstName}
{/* Sidebar Menu */}
